dialogue: I'm not hungry today. Do you want my banana?
Um... no. This is a banana.
I can't believe you are making me do a Google search to prove I know what a banana is.
See? Those are bananas. This looks just like the photos. This is a banana.
There are a million banana images! They are not all doctored!
You know how I know you are wrong? Because you never admit you are wrong.
That's exactly what all the people who are wrong say.
